thread.title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Bank Stocks, Friendly Facebook, Sandra Bernhard

author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Bank Stocks, Friendly Facebook, Sandra Bernhard
text:
Bank profits are doing great; bank stocks, not so much. One big reason is uncertainty over future dividends and buybacks, writes Aaron Back. This is ultimately in the hands of the Federal Reserve. The central bank determines how much large banks are allowed to pay out to shareholders—from July through the following June every year—through […]
